name: A Royal Trance
description:
The queen is sleepwalking! Guide her around the castle back to her bedroom!

Controls:

  • Move Player - A/D or left/right arrow keys
  • Jump - W or up arrow key
  • Grab Queen - E or space bar (you can jump while holding queen)

Instructions:

  • Give the queen a clear path to walk! She can only move right.
  • If the queen gets stuck or needs to climb stairs, grab the queen and jump!
  • The queen will trip on small crates. Move them out of her way!
  • Avoid spikes and falling chandeliers! They'll kill the queen.
